kce.name: KCE
items: Infrastructure- Development of road infrastructure, modern housing, and sustainable public buildings
Energy- Innovative electrification solutions for both rural and urban areas
Mines- Development of mineral resources (iron, cement) to strengthen a competitive national industry

Optimization- Digital traceability solutions and online platforms connecting producers and buyers

about.title: About KING SA
about.description: KING SA, a private investment company founded in 2023 in Bamako, Mali, embodies a Pan-African vision focused on economic sovereignty and sustainable development. The Kane Foundation is dedicated to humanitarian efforts.
